articles.title: Parents Of Stanford Soccer Player Katie Meyer Open Up: 'We're Struggling' - TODAY
articles.description: Katie Meyer, a promising 22-year old captain and goalkeeper on Stanford University’s women’s soccer team, was found dead in her dorm room earlier this week a...
